name: Dungeon Legend
description:
Game content:
Dungeon Legend is a 3D action platformer that is easy to learn, exciting to play, and deep enough to challenge the greatest gamers. You'll be rewarded for manipulating a cubeman to run the game, a fast-paced game that's heartbreaking yet engaging and addictive. Enjoy extreme speed, dash forward and master the action. Response and timing are key in Dungeon Legend.
Get ready for impossible challenges and push your skills to the limit. The rhythm of the obstacle avoidance game is very tight. The goal of the game is to score as many points as possible. .

operate:
WASD controls up, down, left, and right
Avoid kaleidoscopic obstacles and pick up energy points along the way
Game difficulty increases as the game progresses

feature:
* Difficulty progression.
* Competitive, challenging and stimulating
* There is no limit to the level of the stage. Try as many times as necessary.
* Simple controls.
